title: [ICE]: index out of bounds: the len is 0 but the index is 0

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code

https://github.com/SebastianSpeitel/rustc_panic


### Affected release channels

- [ ] Previous Stable
- [X] Current Stable
- [ ] Current Beta
- [ ] Current Nightly

### Rust Version

```Shell
rustc 1.66.1 (90743e729 2023-01-10) (gentoo)
binary: rustc
commit-hash: 90743e7298aca107ddaa0c202a4d3604e29bfeb6
commit-date: 2023-01-10
host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
release: 1.66.1
LLVM version: 15.0.6
```
